title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: When using code assist, the file is being marked as dirty even though no changes have been made to the file.
OB: When using code assist, the file is marked as dirty even though no changes have been made to the file.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as dirty.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a file.
2. Invoke code assist in an area where there are no suggestions.
3. Check the file status, it should not be marked as dirty.
